2022 - 2024
Project Manager | Lead Android developer
Voltu Motor
Paraná, Entre Ríos, Argentina
As Project Manager for the software development team of 4 members at Voltu Motor:

  • Led strategic planning and management of software projects.
  • Defined hardware and software requirements and led the development of the HMI system for electric vehicles, optimizing functionality and user experience.
  • Implemented Scrum methodology, resulting in a 30% increase in project efficiency and successful expansion of the fleet from 2 to 10 vehicles.
  • Maintained continuous communication with users to refine features and identify future improvements.
  • Provided 24/7 support for a 10-vehicle fleet and monitored performance metrics.
2020 - 2022
Chief Technology Officer - Co founder
KrakenMED
Oro Verde, Entre Ríos, Argentina
Founder of KrakenMED, a Medtech startup focused on developing scalp cooling devices to mitigate chemoterapy-induced alopecia

  • Led the design of the first prototype, coordinating a team of 7 multidisciplinary professionals with a focus on customer and end-user needs.
  • Secured and managed a funding of $35, 000 USD to support the design and manufacturing process of the first prototype.
  • Acted as a key spokesperson, representing the company in events and networking opportunities.
